name: STILLA ADVENTURE 2D
description: MUTANT PLANTS HAVE TAKEN OVER HUMANITY, ONLY ONE HOPE REMAINS AND THE FATE OF THE ENTIRE HUMAN RACE REST ON HIS WORRY SHOULDERS. YOUNG AND FEARLESS BROUGHT UP IN THE URBAN DEPTHS OF THE FORGOTTEN , AMONG THE GLOBES MOST FEARED INNER CITY DELINQUENTS. FROM THE MOST UNLIKELY BEGINNINGS RISES A HERO LIKE NONE BEFORE TO END THIS CHAOTIC PERIOD HIS NAME IS STILLA-2D.
developers: J A Y - S T I L L A  -  I  N  C .
